thread.title: OPS vs Sasikala: Edappadi K Palaniswami elected as AIADMK legislature party leader, Panneerselvam sacked from party
thread.title_full: OPS vs Sasikala: Edappadi K Palaniswami elected as AIADMK legislature party leader, Panneerselvam sacked from party

title: OPS vs Sasikala: Edappadi K Palaniswami elected as AIADMK legislature party leader, Panneerselvam sacked from party
text: Â» OPS vs Sasikala: Edappadi K Palaniswami elected as AIADMK legislature party leader, Panneerselvam sacked from party OPS vs Sasikala: Edappadi K Palaniswami elected as AIADMK legislature party leader, Panneerselvam sacked from party Palaniswami was elected as legislature party leader to stake claim for the chief minister post after Sasikala held talks with the legislators. | TNN | Updated: Feb 14, 2017, 01.11 PM IST Highlights Sasikala camp has eleted Palaniswami as AIADMK legislature party leader. It has also sacked Panneerselvam from primary membership. SC today upheld Sasikala's conviction in disproportionate assets case. Edappadi K Palaniswami CHENAI: Less than two hours after the Supreme Court upheld the trial court's verdict in the disproportionate assets case against AIADMK general secretary V K Sasikala and others, party MLAs staying at a resort in Koovathur on Tuesday elected highways minister Edappadi K Palaniswami as legislature party leader. Palaniswami was elected as legislature party leader to stake claim for the chief minister post after Sasikala held talks with the legislators. In a related development, chief minister O Panneerselvam has been expelled from the primary membership of the party.
